item.title: I am a former Goldman Sachs employee, how do I obtain information regarding award stock?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: You should speak with your personal stockbroker about purchasing any stock in an IPO. You cannot purchase any securities (in an IPO or otherwise) from Goldman Sachs unless you already have an account with us. However, as our clients are primarily corporations, financial institutions, governments and high net worth individuals, we do not offer retail brokerage accounts.

item.title: How do I get information on a stock that Goldman, Sachs & Co. is underwriting?
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: You should speak with your personal stockbroker about purchasing any stock in an IPO. You cannot purchase any securities (in an IPO or otherwise) from Goldman Sachs unless you already have an account with us. However, as our clients are primarily corporations, financial institutions, governments and high net worth individuals, we do not offer retail brokerage accounts.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: House of Holland
item.dc:creator: wooteam
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo. Graduating in Journalism, Henry Holland used his way with words to catapult himself into the fashion limelight, with his ‘Fashion Groupies’ slogan t-shirts. Witty mottos such as “Get Your Freak On Giles Deacon”, created a stir within the fashion world and Holland was snapped up by the prestigious Fashion East collective. Designed with the London girl aesthetic in mind, House of Holland creates eclectic collections of dresses, jersey pieces and tailored separates, with focus on vibrantly kitsch prints and bold, contrasting textures. You can buy this product here
item.excerpt:encoded:

Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt. Cras dapibus. Vivamus elementum semper nisi. Aenean vulputate eleifend tellus. Aenean leo ligula, porttitor eu, consequat vitae, eleifend ac, enim. Aliquam lorem ante, dapibus in, viverra quis, feugiat a, tellus. item.excerpt:encoded: Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt. Cras dapibus. Vivamus elementum semper nisi. Aenean vulputate eleifend tellus. [contentrow][two_third][list] [list_li]Made from a chunky-knit[/list_li] [list_li]Intarsia sheep and slogan design[/list_li] [list_li]Turn-up detail[/list_li] [list_li]Pom-pom embellishment[/list_li] [list_li]Classic beanie shape[/list_li] [list_li]Matching garments available[/list_li] [/list][/two_third][/contentrow] [h6_heading]About Monki[/h6_heading] If you’re all for personality and expression then Monki are the ones for you. Known for their street-style-meets-Scandi-chic design and super-fun story-based store concepts, Monki grab bold, brash colours and a whole lot of prints and patterns before playing them out across a collection of ’90s crop tops, bodycon dresses and skinny print jeans.

item.title: Ankerkjendt Shirt
item.dc:creator: wooteam
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo. Danish label Anerkjendt is easy-going and laid back. Drawing inspiration from nature, Anerkjendt's first collection takes the structured surfaces of the great outdoors and breathes life into the garments. An easy wearing collection of knitwear, jackets and chinos draw from earthy colours, structured and washed elements and leather and wool detailing to add an adventurous feel. You can buy this product here

[contentrow][two_third][list] [list_li]Made from 100% cotton[/list_li] [list_li]Classic pointed collar[/list_li] [list_li]Button through fastening to front[/list_li] [list_li]Print design[/list_li] [list_li]Notched hem to sides[/list_li] [list_li]Regular fit[/list_li] [/list][/two_third][/contentrow] [h6_heading]About Anerkjendt[/h6_heading] Danish label Anerkjendt is easy-going and laid back. Drawing inspiration from nature, Anerkjendt's first collection takes the structured surfaces of the great outdoors and breathes life into the garments. An easy wearing collection of knitwear, jackets and chinos draw from earthy colours, structured and washed elements and leather and wool detailing to add an adventurous feel.

item.title: Perry Laurel Wreath
item.dc:creator: wooteam
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo. Fred Perry's authentic menswear collection is heavily influenced by the brand's historical roots in sport and classic, urban menswear. The range, including the iconic slim fit polo shirt, blends British style with the edge and attitude garnered from the brands unique streetwear credentials. You can buy this product here
item.excerpt:encoded: Nulla consequat massa quis enim. Donec pede justo, fringilla vel, aliquet nec, vulputate eget, arcu. In enim justo, rhoncus ut, imperdiet a, venenatis vitae, justo. Nullam dictum felis eu pede mollis pretium. Integer tincidunt. Cras dapibus. Vivamus elementum semper nisi. Aenean vulputate eleifend tellus. Aenean leo ligula, porttitor eu, consequat vitae, eleifend ac, enim. Aliquam lorem ante, dapibus in, viverra quis, feugiat a, tellus. [contentrow][two_third][list] [list_li]Made from a breathable cotton pique[/list_li] [list_li]Signature twin tipping detail on collar and cuffs[/list_li] [list_li]Embroidered sporting wreath logo[/list_li] [list_li]Side slits for ease of movement[/list_li] [list_li]Ribbed cuffs to stop stretching[/list_li] [list_li]Extended tail to prevent shirt coming loose[/list_li] [/list][/two_third][/contentrow] [h6_heading]About Fred Perry[/h6_heading] Fred Perry's authentic menswear collection is heavily influenced by the brand's historical roots in sport and classic, urban menswear. The range, including the iconic slim fit polo shirt, blends British style with the edge and attitude garnered from the brands unique streetwear credentials.

item.title: Spam

item.content:encoded: Spam example

item.title: How to install bbpress plugin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit 'Plugins > Add New'
  2. Search for 'bbPress'
  3. Activate bbPress from your Plugins page. (You'll be greeted with a Welcome page.)
  4. Visit 'Forums > Add New' and create some forums. (You can always delete these later.) 5a. If you have pretty permalinks enabled, visit yourdomain.com/forums. 5b. If you do not have pretty permalinks enabled, visit yourdomain.com?post_type=forum

From WordPress.org

  1. Download bbPress.
  2. Upload the 'bbpress' directory to your '/wp-content/plugins/' directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc...)
  3. Activate bbPress from your Plugins page. (You'll be greeted with a Welcome page.)
  4. Visit 'Forums > Add New' and create some forums. (You can always delete these later.) 5a. If you have pretty permalinks enabled, visit yourdomain.com/forums. 5b. If you do not have pretty permalinks enabled, visit yourdomain.com?post_type=forum

Extra

  1. Visit 'Settings > Forums' and adjust your configuration.
  2. Adjust the CSS of your theme as needed, to make everything pretty.
